WRITING.TEXT: Would be cool if this photo inspires someone to start a graphic novel.

The problem is that the event is a 30 year anniversary of the Air Max sillhouette... and I am required to clean everyone that comes with any kind of airmax, but thank you for the suggestion anyway, really appreciate it.

WRITING.TITLE: [Question] How to dry sneakers while someone is wearing them?
WRITING.TEXT: I am kinda new to the sneaker cleaning bussines, I have a local bussines in my city and have been invitet by a well known shop here to clean shoes at an event. The cleaning process I use is working really well for orders that i take home but the drying process is natural drying at my window and takes about an hour. At this event i am required to clean shoes while people are wearing them, that is not a problem for the cleaning process, but I have to find a faster way to dry them while they are wearing them. Any suggestions?
I have to admit... the simplicity of it is quite attractive
